title: Nyrulna
content:
ation & Where to Find

Location: Pickpocket Akabi (genie) at Circus of the Last Days in Rivington (Act 3) and spin the wheel to be teleported to a jungle, find the chest at (X-1514, Y-1521). Alternatively, a Bard character can distract the genie. Quest: Crafting: Merchant: Dropped by:

Nyrulna Notes & Tips for BG3
